properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
huniongoza mwokozi ndipo nami
hufurahi.
niendapo pote napo ataniongoza papo.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
huongoza hunishika
kwa mkono wako
nitaandamana naye
Kristu aniongozaye

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
pengine ni mashakani nami pengine rahani
ni radhi ijayo yote
yuko nami siku zote

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
mkono akinishika kamwe sitanungunika
atakachoniletea ni tayari kupokea
